    • onActionAddAppointment

      void onActionAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Adds an appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered this method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error with the database.
      IOException - If there is an error with the file system.
